title: Customer List
description: Schema for a list of customer records

Index.description: The unique index of the customer

Customer Id.description: The unique identifier for the customer

First Name.description: The first name of the customer

Last Name.description: The last name of the customer

Company.description: The company the customer is associated with

City.description: The city where the customer is located

Country.description: The country where the customer is located

Phone 1.description: The primary phone number of the customer

Phone 2.description: The secondary phone number of the customer

Email.description: The email address of the customer

Subscription Date.description: The date when the customer subscribed

Website.description: The website of the customer or associated company
